Dear backcare, please inform the following message to the customer.

Hello James, You can find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will handle your return. Just drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. A list of locations can be found here: To prepare for your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any existing protective covering or film. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below. To package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, and your product should fit snugly inside so it doesn't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also place a spare label inside for identification in case the original label is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both the inside and outside before shipping. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you as soon as it arrives at our facility.
